Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.repository

Interface AppointmentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Appointment>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Appointment,Long>
public interface AppointmentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Long>
Repository interface for managing Appointment entities. Provides methods for querying appointments based on various criteria.

  • Method Details

    • findAllByUserId

      @Query("SELECT a FROM Appointment a WHERE a.patient.id =:userId OR a.veterinarian.id =:userId") List<Appointment> findAllByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Finds all appointments associated with a specific user, either as a patient or a veterinarian.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      a list of appointments involving the specified user.

    • findByVeterinarianAndAppointmentDate

      List<Appointment> findByVeterinarianAndAppointmentDate(User veterinarian, LocalDate requestedDate)
      Finds appointments for a specific veterinarian on a given date.
      Parameters:
      veterinarian - the veterinarian entity.
      requestedDate - the date for which appointments are being queried.
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified veterinarian on the given date.

    • findByVeterinarianIdAndAppointmentDate

      List<Appointment> findByVeterinarianIdAndAppointmentDate(Long veterinarianId, LocalDate requestedDate)
      Finds appointments for a veterinarian by their ID and a specific date.
      Parameters:
      veterinarianId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      requestedDate - the date for which appointments are being queried.
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified veterinarian on the given date.

    • findAll

      @NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Appointment> findAll(@NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all appointments with pagination support.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Long>
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination information.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of appointments.

    • searchAppointments

      @Query("SELECT a FROM Appointment a WHERE LOWER(a.patient.email) LIKE %:search% OR LOWER(a.veterinarian.email) LIKE %:search% OR LOWER(a.appointmentNo) LIKE %:search%") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Appointment> searchAppointments(@Param("search") String search, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Searches for appointments based on a search term with pagination support. The search term is matched against the patient email, veterinarian email, and appointment number fields.
      Parameters:
      search - the search term to filter appointments (case-insensitive). Matches substrings within patient email, veterinarian email, or appointment number.
      pageable - the pagination and sorting information.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of appointments that match the search criteria.

    • countByPatientIdAndStatusNotIn

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(a) FROM Appointment a WHERE a.patient.id = :senderId AND a.status NOT IN :excludedStatuses") int countByPatientIdAndStatusNotIn(@Param("senderId") Long senderId, @Param("excludedStatuses") List<AppointmentStatus> excludedStatuses)
      Counts the number of active appointments for a specific patient, excluding certain statuses.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the patient.
      excludedStatuses - the statuses to exclude from the count.
      Returns:
      the count of active appointments for the patient.

    • existsByVeterinarianIdAndPatientIdAndStatus

      boolean existsByVeterinarianIdAndPatientIdAndStatus(Long veterinarianId, Long reviewerId, AppointmentStatus appointmentStatus)
      Checks if an appointment exists between a veterinarian and a patient with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      veterinarianId - the ID of the veterinarian.
      reviewerId - the ID of the patient.
      appointmentStatus - the status of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if such an appointment exists, otherwise false.

    • existsByAppointmentNo

      boolean existsByAppointmentNo(String appointmentNo)
      Checks whether an appointment exists by its unique appointment number.
      Parameters:
      appointmentNo - the unique identifier of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if an appointment with the given number exists, otherwise false.

    • findAllIds

      @Query("SELECT a.id FROM Appointment a") List<Long> findAllIds()
      Retrieves the IDs of all appointments from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of appointment IDs.

    • getAppointmentSummary

      @Query("SELECT a.status AS name, COUNT(a) AS value FROM Appointment a GROUP BY a.status") List<Map<String,Object>> getAppointmentSummary()
      Retrieves a summary of appointments grouped by their status. The summary includes the count of appointments for each status.
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map contains the status and the count.
